cPoem

Class for the full processed poem object.

newLine

Parameter
newLine

new cLine

get text
get text()

Getter. Gets original text with which this object was constructed

adjustCharMaatraa
adjustCharMaatraa(
lineIdx,
charIdx
)

Adjust maatraa of character of given index, in line of given index. Update other requisite variables accordingly

Parameters - - lineIdx - index of line where character exists whose maatraa has to be adjusted - charIdx - index of character in line whose maatraa has to be adjusted

setComposite
setComposite(
lineIdx
)

Toggle line of given index as composite line. For Free Verse.

Parameters - - lineIdx - index of line whose composite flag is to be toggled

setBaseCount
setBaseCount(
baseCount
)

Set base meter count for this poem, and update composite counts accordingly.

Parameters - - baseCount - Base count integer
